00045 /**
00046  * @brief CNAnalysisMethodCovariateSignalAdjuster - Class for doing covariate-based signal adjustment
00047  */
00048 class CNAnalysisMethodCovariateSignalAdjuster : public CNAnalysisMethod
00049 {
00050 public:
00051     static std::string getType() {return "covariate-signal-adjuster";}
00052     static std::string getDescription() {return "Covariate Signal Adjuster";}
00053     static std::string getVersion() {return "1.0";}
00054 
00055     static SelfDoc explainSelf();
00056     static std::vector<SelfDoc::Opt> getDefaultDocOptions();
00057     static SelfCreate* newObject(std::map<std::string, std::string>& param);
00058 
00059 public:
00060     CNAnalysisMethodCovariateSignalAdjuster();
00061     ~CNAnalysisMethodCovariateSignalAdjuster();
00062 
00063     virtual bool isSegmentTypeAnalysis() {return false;}
00064 
00065     virtual AffxString getName() {return getType();}
00066 
00067     virtual void run();
00068 
00069 protected:
00070     void adjustSignals();
00071 
00072     int determineBins(vector<float>& covValues, vector<int>& binning, int covariateIndex);
00073 
00074     std::vector<int>& getSignalCovariates();
00075 
00076     float getIntensity(CNProbe* probe)
00077     {
00078         if (m_alternateIntensities == NULL)
00079         {
00080             return probe->getIntensity();
00081         }
00082         else
00083         {
00084             return m_alternateIntensities->at(probe->getProbeID() - 1);
00085         }
00086     }
00087 
00088     void setAdjustedIntensity(CNProbe* probe, float intensity)
00089     {
00090         if (m_alternateIntensities == NULL)
00091         {
00092             probe->setIntensity(intensity);
00093         }
00094         else
00095         {
00096             m_alternateIntensities->at(probe->getProbeID() - 1) = intensity;
00097         }
00098     }
00099 
00100     bool doesProcessFlagMatchMarkerClass(int markerClass, int processFlag)
00101     {
00102         // markerClass 0 = CN, 1 = SNP
00103         //
00104         // Marker class: process flag(s)
00105         // SNP: 2,3,4
00106         // CN: 1
00107 
00108         if (markerClass == 0 && processFlag == 1)
00109         {
00110             // CN
00111             return true;
00112         }
00113         else if (markerClass == 1 && (processFlag == 2 || processFlag == 3 || processFlag == 4))
00114         {
00115             // SNP
00116             return true;
00117         }
00118         return false;
00119     }
00120 
00121 public:
00122     // This method was added divert the intensity adjustment from the CNProbe::setIntensity to the passed in vectors.
00123     // Assumes probe intensities are in ProbeID order
00124     void setAlternateIntensities(std::vector<float>& alternateIntensities)
00125     {
00126         m_alternateIntensities = &alternateIntensities;
00127     }
00128 
00129 protected:
00130     std::vector<float>* m_alternateIntensities;
00131 };
